mdRecord.dcterms:title: Griffis, W. Elliot (?) to Faulds; 02 of 02
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 101-112, paper sleeve 3Griffis, W. Elliot (?) to Henry Faulds regarding Fauld's decline of a physician's position, sending copies of the texts "East Asia" and "Fingerprints", and work helping Japan, including that of Faulds and others. Sent from Ithaca, NY, on Grand Union Hotel letterhead.; 1 leaf; DF 648
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faulds, Henry, 18431930
